column4: I'm trying to install the java plugin for firefox and the link I make to the java lib is always broken - how do I get it to work pls?
install java from the package mamner
done that and had no luck... - still no plugin
that always sends me to manual install - and I can only make broken links...
yep - and it installed java1.4 and gave me no plugin - I've enabled java in firefox's preferences
that's where the manual install takes me
w8 if you got it, y do u need to manually install it?
I need to link the java plugin to firefox - and every time I make the link it is broken
firefox has its own plugins tho
but trying to install them says I need to manually install - that takes me to sun - and .... broken link
really? tahts odd, i got it through firefox's own plugins without having to manually install anything. sorry i dunno why that would happen
learnt a lesson - copied and pasted the commands to install java - sun calls the file .s0 when it is .so - it's installed now !
